stanza.line: Alas tis true I have gone here and therethere
And made my self a motley to the viewview
Gored mine own thoughts sold cheap what is most deardear
Made old offences of affections newnew
Most true it is that I have looked on truthtruth
Askance and strangely but by all aboveabove
These blenches gave my heart another youthyouth
And worse essays proved thee my best of lovelove
Now all is done have what shall have no endend
Mine appetite I never more will grindgrind
On newer proof to try an older friendfriend
A god in love to whom I am confinedconfined
Then give me welcome next my heaven the bestbest
Even to thy pure and most most loving breastbreast
